item.description:

::compareips name-name
::compareipsname, name
::compareips name,name
::compareips name , name

etc.

item.source: What is the ::compareips command and how do i use it?

item.title: What is the ::compareips command and how do i use it?
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

[quote=“microscape, post:1, topic:344696”]Hey guys! i am new to MoparScape forums but i have a quick question does anyone know how to use the compare ips command?? this is what i got

[quote]
if (command.startsWith(“compareips”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(command, “-”);
if(st.countTokens() == 3) {
st.nextToken();
String otherPName = st.nextToken();
String otherPName2 = st.nextToken();[/quote]

that is the main part of the command but how do i use this? please help [/quote]
Just try it out, it will be a lot easier if you try it out.

Read full topic

Hey guys! i am new to MoparScape forums but i have a quick question does anyone know how to use the compare ips command?? this is what i got

if (command.startsWith("compareips") && playerRights >= 1) { try { StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(command, "-"); if(st.countTokens() == 3) { st.nextToken(); String otherPName = st.nextToken(); String otherPName2 = st.nextToken();

that is the main part of the command but how do i use this? please help
